title: Omega Psi Phi, Smokey Robinson, Howard University, Junior Poetry and more.
itunes:title: Omega Psi Phi, Smokey Robinson, Howard University, Junior Poetry and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! God woke us up this morning and WE A LIVE Morning Show! Did you hear that? Happy Founders Day to Omega Psi Phi Fraternity Incorporated! The Chief Love Officer questions a woman dealing with a "dirty cheater" and it stings. Smokey Robinson has a controversial stance that brings to the phones and The Steve Harvey Nation. Junior has a brand new poem just for 45. In Sports Talk, Junior talks about Houston that inspires Steve to start playing basketball. We give you the reason why the Georgia Runoff Election is vital to the country. Howard University gets $1 million to start building in a new direction. Junior's playlist will have you feeling good and it has no Jodeci in it. Today in Closing Remarks, Steve breaks down generational wealth.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
